RAGNode_711.name: vectorDB
RAGNode_711.label: Database
RAGNode_711.description: Select the vector database to be queried.

RAGNode_711.name: embeddingModelName
RAGNode_711.label: Embedding Model Name
RAGNode_711.description: This field allows the user to select the embedding model used to embed the query into vector space. It loads available embedding models through the listModels method.

RAGNode_711.name: generativeModelName
RAGNode_711.label: Generative Model Name
RAGNode_711.description: Select the model to generate responses from the query results.
